responses.question: What is the main object in this image?
responses.template: The main object in this image is a {class_name}.

responses.question: What colors can you see in this image?
responses.template: The {class_name} has typical colors for its class.

responses.question: Is this a natural or man-made object?
What is the background of this image?
responses.template: The background of this image is typical for a {class_name}.

bird.description: A warm-blooded egg-laying vertebrate with feathers

deer.description: A hoofed ruminant mammal with antlers

frog.description: A tailless amphibian with a short body and webbed feet

horse.description: A large domesticated mammal used for riding and pulling

ship.description: A large vessel for transporting passengers or cargo by sea

truck.description: A large motor vehicle designed to transport cargo
